actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations

official_title: To amend the Act of March 3, 1863, incorporating the National Academy of Sciences, to authorize the Federal Government to indemnify the Academy against liability for certain pecuniary losses to third persons arising from projects and activities undertaken by the Academy.

summary.text: Amends Federal law to indemnify the National Academy of Sciences against certain third party tort liability.

titles.title: To amend the Act of March 3, 1863, incorporating the National Academy of Sciences, to authorize the Federal Government to indemnify the Academy against liability for certain pecuniary losses to third persons arising from projects and activities undertaken by the Academy.
